member.name: M:Ploeh.QualityTools.AutoFixture.ObjectBuilder`1.With``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,``0}})
member.summary: Registers that a writable property or field should be assigned a value when an object is subsequently created.
member.typeparam: The type of the property or field.
member.param: An expression that identifies the property or field that will should have a value assigned.
member.returns: An that can be used to create anonymous objects, or further customize the creation algorithm.

remarks.para: While the default behavior is that writable properties or fields are automatically assigned values, can change this behavior. In this case, the With method offers an explicit opt-in functionality. When used without OmitAutoProperties, this With overload has no particular effect, since a value would have been assigned none the less.
